name: bespoke-multimedia

readme:
# bespoke-multimedia

Toggles playback of multimedia and restarts SVG and GIF animations on the active slide in a [Bespoke.js](http://markdalgleish.com/projects/bespoke.js) presentation.

## Usage

This plugin is shipped in a [UMD format](https://github.com/umdjs/umd), meaning it is available as a CommonJS/AMD module or as a browser global.

For example, when using CommonJS modules:

```js
var bespoke = require('bespoke'),
  multimedia = require('bespoke-multimedia');

bespoke.from('.deck', [
  multimedia()
]);
```

When using browser globals:

```js
bespoke.from('.deck', [
  bespoke.plugins.multimedia()
]);
```

## Package managers

### npm

```bash
$ npm install bespoke-multimedia
```

### Bower

```bash
$ bower install bespoke-multimedia
```
